ack.p: We are thankful to the department that facilitated the collection of Culicidae at Fiocruz Rio de Janeiro. We give special thanks to Maycon Neves and Monique Motta, who are members of their staff. Additionally, we would like to thank Otavio Ribeiro and João Marcelo from the High Performance Computing Center of SENAI CIMATEC—Bahia. Tiago Trocoli and Nelson Alves from the Brazilian Institute of Robotics, SENAI CIMATEC—Bahia, provided valuable support.
